title: "Vaudevilles et chansons"
description: Binding: Contemporary French blue morocco, gilt with the arms of Michel Begon on front and back.
Containing a collection of anonymous French love songs and vaudevilles, with an alphabetical index at the back.
references: Vaudevilles et Chansons. James Marshall and Marie-Louise Osborn Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.
provenanceUncontrolled: For information on the source of acquisition, consult the appropriate curator.
